author: mrglavas
msg: Clear the map of unparsed entities before reuse.

author: mrglavas
msg: Supporting validation of xs:ENTITY and also fixing a bug.
We need to use a different ValidationManager than the
one in the configuration so that the validators in the pipeline
don't interfere with the one for the Schema.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding a version tag to several classes.

author: mrglavas
msg: An XMLDTDHandler which records the names of unparsed entites in the DTD.
We need this component in order to support the xs:ENTITY type.

author: mrglavas
msg: Clean-up unused imports introduced in the last commit.
